title: Credit card to buy RP aint working
body: I recently tried to buy RP , like 2 days ago , but it kept saying my card details were wrong so it said "Please try again in 24 hours" its been like 30 hours , how is it still not working?

replies.body: Maybe try sending in a support ticket (SUPPORT at the top of this web page) see if they can help you figure out the problem. Or you may have to contact your bank if it has problems with purchases that are not from Riot Games?
